overview: Join Zuma, a gorgeous sexual gladiator slave, as she battles her way through wild and wicked 3D animated adventures on the melting-pot planet, Stratalyrie! This rare Earthling, from unknown origins, encounters a fantastic range of incredible creatures as she builds her fame in the public sexual contests of the Grand Nymphoseum. Powerful forces try to use and bend her o their own corrupt ends, throwing her into action packed twists and turns of danger and peril. Determined to win her freedom. . . a most unexpected rival threatens to defeat her!
title: PornoMation 2
